item.title: dinnertable: A 20-Seat Speakeasy-Style Restaurant
item.description:
dinnertable: A 20-Seat Speakeasy-Style Restaurant

The sign beside the interior door reads "Press for Food." If you're in front of it, you've just walked through the bustling East Village cocktail bar The Garret East, beyond a curtain, into a petite corridor. A push of the analog button sends a chime to the inside and you're promptly greeted.

item.title: 7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.
item.description:
7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.

If Spring had an official cocktail, the Pimm's Cup would be it. It's ultra-refreshing, bright and vibrant-and as easy to make as it is to drink. To mix a basic version of the classic British cocktail, all you need is Pimm's No. 1, ginger ale (or some sort of lemon-lime soda), cucumber and lemon.

item.title: Thinking inside the box: Prepd reinvents the lunchbox.
item.description:
Thinking inside the box: Prepd reinvents the lunchbox.

Packing attention to detail, intelligent design and delicious food into lunchtime is San Francisco-based team Prepd, founded by Chris Place and Will Matters. Their creation, 'Prepd Pack', is a modern take on the classic lunchbox, launched in January 2016 via a Kickstarter campaign that raised over $1 million.

item.title: Timbuk2 + Blue Bottle's Sabbatical Travel Kit
item.description:
Timbuk2 + Blue Bottle's Sabbatical Travel Kit

If the recent buyouts of Intelligentsia and Stumptown are any indication, the growing popularity of craft coffee shows no signs of slowing down. While single origin pour-overs are now commonplace in many coffeeshops, sometimes when you're off the beaten path, your morning cup of coffee is harder to perfect.

item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.
